properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fill Thou my life O Lord my God In ev'ry part with praise That my whole being May proclaim Thy being And Thy ways{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not for the lip Of praise alone Nor e'en the praising heart I ask but for a life made up Of praise in every part{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise in the common Things of life Its goings out and in Praise in each duty And each deed However small and mean{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fill every part Of me with praise Let all my being speak Of Thee and of Thy love O Lord Poor though I be and weak{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So shalt Thou Lord From me e'en me Receive the glory due And so shall I Begin on earth The song forever new{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So shall no part Of day or night From sacredness be free But all my life In every step Be fellowship with Thee{/lang-eng}
